channel.title: Creations on My Hugo Resume
channel.description: Recent content in Creations on My Hugo Resume

item.title: IMAP Locator
item.description: Takes in positional command line argument to search for specific user and an optional -f or -file argument to specify the file to parse

item.title: NBA Stat Checker
item.description: NBA Stat Checker is Python program that gathers web data and displays the top NBA players in a particular stat category (points-per-game, assists-per-game, rebounds-per-game, etc)

item.title: Raspberry pi Morse Sender/Receiver
item.description: Python program that utilizes Raspberry pis, IR light, and IR receiver to send morse via infrared. User inputs an english phrase, phrase is translated and transmitted via long and short light signals, is received by a second pi via infrared receiver, then finally retranslated into english
